alert.note: Alert for Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:50AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rockdale, central Henry, south central Walton and Newton Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 850 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Snapfinger, or 7 miles southeast of Decatur, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Covington, Stockbridge, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Mansfield, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Magnet, Almon, Milstead, Starrsville, Brick Store, Kelleytown, Oak Hill and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
